evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: declaring that the Executive branch does not have authority to impose universal tariffs on the border Tribes and that such tariffs are illegal at cross border ports of entry on historically owned tribal lands, specifically at the border crossings at Roosville, Piegan/Carway, and Del Bonita;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Stay tariffs at Roosville, Del Bonita, and Piegan/Carway ports of entry
